amendment.description: At the end of the division (before the short title) insert the following new section: Sec. XX. None of the funds made available in this division may be used-- (1) to implement***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 61 printed in House Report 115-259 to state that limitation amendment pertaining to lightbulb energy efficiency regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Burgess.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
